insertBefore.xpath: //item[ not (substring(@name, string-length(@name) - string-length('Blueprint') + 1) = 'Blueprint') and ((starts-with(@name,'meleeToolAxe')) or (starts-with(@name,'ulmMeleeBlade')) or (starts-with(@name,'meleeWpnBlade'))) ]/effect_group/passive_effect[ (@operation='base_set') and (@name='HarvestCount')]
